Heya! So, i have been trying to use this code i found:

 < audio src="http://media.textadventures.co.uk/games/1RurGHLuLUqrWdMJh53LTQ/bushcave-explicit-r9/sounds/bushcave.ogg" autoplay / >

I used to try and get it to play music, and it works, with the music i have, but i cant put other musics to it, do they need to be in a specific format? Where should i upload the audios i want to use in my game? Im using the browser version on windows, if it matters. Thanks!
